name: Hindustan Aviation Academy
about: Hindustan Aviation Academy, established in 1983 in Bengaluru, Karnataka, is a renowned institution for aviation training. Affiliated with Bharathiar University and approved by the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA), the academy offers three Aircraft Maintenance Engineering courses, including a two-year basic AME course and a four-and-a-half-year AME Full License course. The academy is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, including live operational aircraft, simulators, and well-equipped laboratories. It boasts a highly qualified faculty with experience from prominent airlines and organizations. The academy provides practical training and has long-term agreements with IndiGo Airlines and Airworks India Engineering Pvt Ltd for placements. With a strong focus on safety and industry standards, Hindustan Aviation Academy prepares students for successful careers in aviation.
